title: Self-Compassion and Well-Being Enhancement Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Core Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening experiential learning through smartphone-based learning materials, personal journaling, and peer feedback in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20% reduction in stress indices by practicing 15-minute mindfulness training three times weekly over eight weeks.
Learners demonstrate a 15% or greater improvement in scores on the Self-Compassion Scale (SCS) assessment within six months
Learners document and present three or more case studies applying self-compassion techniques through clinical simulations and role-playing

resources: Mindfulness App for Smartphones (e.g., Insight Timer)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
